name: create-comm-sites-specific-locale
title: Create Modern Sites as alternative primary language
shortDescription: Create a modern site in another language as the primary language
longDescription: This script will show you how by creating a modern site with the primary language set to a language other than English.

thumbnails.alt: Preview of the resulting site as another language
